code: @Override public void process(HttpRequest request, HttpContext context) throws HttpException, IOException {     HttpCoreContext coreContext = HttpCoreContext.adapt(context).     /* MIME header */     request.addHeader(AS2Header.MIME_VERSION, AS2Constants.MIME_VERSION).     /* AS2-Version header */     request.addHeader(AS2Header.AS2_VERSION, as2Version).     /* Message-Id header */     // SHOULD be set to aid in message reconciliation     request.addHeader(AS2Header.MESSAGE_ID, AS2Utils.createMessageId(senderFQDN)).     /* Recipient-Address header */     String recipientAddress = coreContext.getAttribute(AS2AsynchronousMDNManager.RECIPIENT_ADDRESS, String.class).     request.addHeader(AS2Header.RECIPIENT_ADDRESS, recipientAddress). }
